metadata.synopsis: Player interacted with the knocked out hag after combat with her. Player can cut Vanra out of the hag and save her.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Start dialogue with the knocked out hag, originally located at -113.169; 24.137; -85.022

3.speaker: Narrator
3.text: *Auntie Ethel lies unconscious - her stomach bulging from the child she ate.*
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player kneels down over the hag, blood splattering on them as they cut open the hag's stomach. Shot so you don't see the cutting itself, just enough to imply it. Vanra will run off OUTSIDE of the scene in gameplay.InternalNodeContext: Showing party member doing soimethin with his/her hands and blood spalttering over themNodeContext: Player kneels down over the hag, blood splattering on them as they cut open the hag's stomach. No gore shown.
